form.name: postpartum_exercises_five
form.page_subtitle: PNC Counselling: Postpartum Exercises> Postpartum Exercises FIVE

field.name: Kegel Exercise: strengthens muscles that help make delivery easier, and reduces the chance of complications during delivery.
Tighten the muscles around your anal opening and in your vagina (as if you holding back urine). Hold for a count of 3, then relax.
This exercise can be done anytime during the day when you are sitting down.
